description: Try our easy to follow Lemon & Tea Syrup Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Lemon & Tea Syrup Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Slowly pour the syrup over the loaf. Allow to cool, then lift loaf out of pan using the paper. Cut into slices to serve.
